meanings.definition: The act of sexual intercourse between individuals.
meanings.sent1: The copulations of animals ensure the continuation of their species.
meanings.sent2: Humans engage in copulations to express love and create offspring.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper chuckled at the copulations of the penguins, finding their waddling courtship dance amusing.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, the copulations can be a matter of life and death, as some females consume the males after mating.
meanings.sent5: The documentary vividly captured the copulations of various creatures in the wild, showcasing the diversity of mating rituals.

meanings.definition: The process of mating or breeding.
meanings.sent1: The copulations of birds often involve elaborate dances and displays to attract a mate.
meanings.sent2: Farmers carefully monitor the copulations of their livestock to ensure successful breeding.
meanings.sent3: The copulations of the bees in the garden fascinated the young child, who observed their intricate pollination process.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, the copulations between flowers and bees are essential for pollination and reproduction.
meanings.sent5: The copulations of the fish in the pond created a mesmerizing dance of colors and patterns, signaling the start of the breeding season.
